DOC.brief_title: Optical Coherence Tomography Investigate FFR-Guided DEB-only Elective Coronary Angioplasty
DOC.detailed_description: Restenosis rate plain-old balloon angioplasty ( POBA ) 30-50 % high . Therefore , interventional concept limit use today . However , dual antiplatelet therapy ( DAPT ) necessary POBA . Contrary , 3rd generation drug-eluting stent ( DES ) prove effective show delayed restenosis 5-15 % , require DAPT least 6 month . Drug-eluting balloon ( DEB ) might promise trade-off POBA DES , since effectively inhibit neointimal proliferation despite minimal duration DAPT . However , still limit data interventional strategy . Thus , aim investigate feasibility fractional flow reserve ( FFR ) - guide use paclitaxel-eluting balloon ( Sequent Please™ , B Braun ) provisional bare metal stenting elective PCI de novo coronary lesion , evaluate 6-month outcome angiography optical coherence tomography ( OCT ) .
